CustomField.description: This setting will ONLY display assigned tasks to the user on My Work, My Projects (all views) and Gantt. - with no ability to Filter and view all.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This setting will ONLY display assigned tasks to the user on My Work, My Projects (all views) and Gantt. - with no ability to Filter and view all.
CustomField.label: Display Assigned Tasks Only
